title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: Teams that could dominate the next decade - Chiefs, Ravens and who else? (Football 8/3)
description:
Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson are here for a MAILBAG Monday where they answer YOUR questions. Tom Brady, Drew Brees, Ben Roethlisberger and Aaron Rodgers days in the NFL are numbered, so with that, which teams are poised to dominate over the next decade? Two of the teams seem super obvious, but filling out a Top 5 proves difficult. Are we not high enough on the Vikings or Colts? Brinson and Wilson break down some supposed contenders and fun new looks we could see in the NFL in 2020. Lastly, Josh, your fantasy league rules are silly!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
